ygData.subject: RE: Lyssa's Voracious Concord
ygData.msgSnippet: What s the incentive to sing it at all?  Just to see things kinda purply at night?  By that time few bards will have trouble getting a light source, hell every
ygData.messageBody:
What's the incentive to sing it at all? Just to see things kinda purply at
night? By that time few bards will have trouble getting a light source,
hell every vendor in sight has a lightstone available for a plat.

-----Original Message-----
From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [mailto:birdman@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 10:59 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Lyssa's Voracious Concord


From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>

Gives ultravision, listed as wind song. What's the incentive to use a
wind instrument instead of simply singing?

Athren Notechaser, Mistmoored out
